DialogueNode.dialogue_text: Hello! I'm Mort Whitman of the Mort Whitman company. You may know me as the creator of iconic characters such as Rodney Rodent or as the mastermind behind the WhitmanWorld family of theme parks. It's a pleasure to meet you.

response_text: It is a pleasure, I am a fan of your work!
Sorry, I've never heard of you.

_GraphNode_101.dialogue_text: Thank you! I never get tired of hearing that. Now let's get to business, I am sure we can help one another here today.

_GraphNode_119.dialogue_text: My friend, how can we help each other?

response_text: I need a piece of information.

_GraphNode_158.dialogue_text: Everything? How much time do you have? Haha!

_GraphNode_176.dialogue_text: Let's see here, I am sure you are referring to this evening's unsavory events? I'll need you to be a little bit more specific.

_GraphNode_194.dialogue_text: I beg your pardon? I resent the question in its entirety. I refuse to even entertain such a ridiculous line of inquiry.

_GraphNode_212.dialogue_text: "Enemy" is such a romantic word, isn't it? And it can be taken so many ways. For the purposes of answering a member of law enforcement I would have to say that yes, I do have enemies. You don't get to where I am without burning a few bridges, after all.

_GraphNode_230.dialogue_text: Just one? Sure! Have at it.

_GraphNode_83.dialogue_text: Wha-... Ah, heh. That's fine! It's a big world with lots of people to know and names to remember. What's is mine to a complete stranger? Haha! I hope we can reach a mutually benefical arrangement here today.
